summary: Presently sponsored by: 1Password Extended Access Management: Secure every sign-in for every app on every device. I've spent more than a decade now writing about how to make Have I Been Pwned (HIBP) fast.  Really fast...
title: Closer to the Edge: Hyperscaling Have I Been Pwned with Cloudflare Workers and Caching

summary: Make use of Azure DevOps’ workload identity federation feature to seamlessly integrate Azure DevOps pipelines with HashiCorp VaultThe topic of how to integrate Azure DevOps Pipelines with HashiCorp Vault has been a tricky one to navigate for some time.  Unlike its more widely adopted sibling GitHub, Azure DevOps doesn’t provide an implicit platform-level identity for its Pipelines with which to facilitate secure communications with external services such as Vault.  My colleague Morgan Peat wrote a blog in July 2023 on precisely this topic; leveraging Azure platform features such as service connections and service principals (SPN) to create that platform identity that allowed for a secure introduction to Vault...
title: Integrating Azure DevOps Pipelines with HashiCorp Vault

summary:
For various reasons I had occasion this evening to give GoToSocial a try so I installed it on my server that's running Coolify but hit a couple of issues which I was able to work around with the help of Lewis and Brandon. 
First up because it's running a reverse proxy, I needed the third option in the Docker compose file.
